text: cng klaw theid(muhammad) xo pwng baw phu sraththa thanghlay xey! Cng yakerng phracea khxng phwk than theid sahrab brrda phu thakhwam di nı lok ni khux (ca di rab kar txbthæn) khwam di læa phændin khx ngxallxhˌ nan kwanghıy phisal thæcring brrda phu xdthn nan ca di rab kar txbthæn rangwal khxng phwk khea xyang smburn doy mi txng khanwn
